jediranger:ArcaneSeer.NAME: Arcane Seer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, #yDiscover #b%d time.
At the start of next turn, #yDiscover #b%d times.

jediranger:DamageEndOfNextTurnPower.NAME: End of Next Turn Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of next turn, take #b%d damage.

jediranger:DamageEndOfThisTurnPower.NAME: End of Turn Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, take #b%d damage.

jediranger:CrimsonPrinterPower.NAME: Crimson Printer
DESCRIPTIONS: Shuffle a copy of the first card you play each turn into your draw pile and lose HP equal to its cost.
Shuffle a copy of the first #b%d cards you play each turn into your draw pile and lose HP equal to its cost.

jediranger:EnchantedArrowsPower.NAME: Enchanted Arrows
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is created during combat, gain #b%d temporary #yStrength.

jediranger:CrimsonHarvestPower.NAME: Crimson Harvest
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, heal #b%d HP.

jediranger:LastGloryPower.NAME: Last Glory
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #yExhausted, #yEmpower #b%d a random card.

jediranger:CrimsonFormPower.NAME: Crimson Form
DESCRIPTIONS: If you don't have enough [E] to play a card you may spend #b3 HP for each [E] missing.

jediranger:CrimsonRunePower.NAME: Crimson Rune
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP during your turn, apply #b%d #yVulnerable to a random enemy.

jediranger:HearthguardPower.NAME: Hearthguard
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yEmpower #b%d all cards in your hand and lose #b%d HP for each card #yEmpowered.

jediranger:MakeshiftArmorPower.NAME: Makeshift Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is created during combat, gain #b%d #yBlock.

jediranger:MakeshiftSwordPower.NAME: Makeshift Sword
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies.

jediranger:ExtraCopyPower.NAME: Extra Copy
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each turn a card is created, shuffle #b%d copy of it into your draw pile.
The first time each turn a card is created, shuffle #b%d copies of it into your draw pile.

jediranger:CrimsonRealityPower.NAME: Crimson Reality
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is created during combat, lose HP equal to its cost and #yUpgrade it.

jediranger:FocusingShardPower.NAME: Focusing Shard
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yEmpower a card, #yEmpower it by #b%d more.
